value.title: Is Baidu’s Stock Cheap At 150?

value.title: GM Ultra Cruise pushes closer to door-to-door self-driving cars
value.excerpt: General Motors is officially dialing its self-driving program up from "Super" to "Ultra." Set to launch in model year 2023, the all-new Ultra Cruise system promises a full hands-free driving experience in 95 percent of driving scenarios.

value.title: Driving AI innovation in tandem with regulation
value.excerpt: This unleashed criticism that the regulations could slow AI innovation, hamstringing Europe in its competition with the U.S. and China for leadership in AI. For example, Andrew McAfee wrote an article titled “EU proposals to regulate AI are only going to hinder innovation.

value.title: Wayve, the Lidar-free self-driving startup, raises $13.6M from Ocado
value.excerpt: Wayve, a U.K.-based self-driving startup that is notable for its use of deep learning and cameras rather than more-costly Lidar and other sensors to guide vehicles, is gearing up for its next stage of development with a strategic backer in its pocket.

value.title: Waymo co-CEO Tekedra Mawakana on how to get self-driving taxis to the mall
value.excerpt: Waymo is working on self-driving taxis, which is a huge deal. Ride-sharing apps like Uber and Lyft have remade cities, allowed people to give up their cars, and generally connected the buttons you push on your phone to real things happening in the world more directly than almost any other app.

value.title: 55 self-driving AI robots deployed to sort postal mails in Greece

value.title: Tesla gears up to launch self-driving software but with a catch
value.excerpt: Tesla will monitor driving behaviors before allowing owners to take advantage of its Full Self-Driving software.

value.title: Those Unassuming Exurbs That Are Just Beyond The Suburbs Are Aiming To Grow Due To AI Self-Driving Cars
value.excerpt: There are recent headlines that people are moving out to the exurbs, a moniker seldom used but that is increasingly becoming known. The odds are that AI self-driving cars will aid in driving the shift toward living in the exurbs.

value.title: For Tesla, Facebook and Others, AI’s Flaws Are Getting Harder to Ignore
value.excerpt: Investors are pouring money into artificial intelligence, despite clear setbacks in self-driving cars, social media and even healthcare.

value.title: Self-driving Citroën Skate carries swappable pods for inner-city travel
value.excerpt: Citroën has introduced an interesting mobility concept that brings together several forward-looking transport technologies into one versatile vehicle. value.title: GCC Artificial Intelligence Market 2021-26: Industry Trends, Size, Share, Analysis and Forecast Report
value.excerpt: According to IMARC Group's latest report, titled "GCC Artificial Intelligence Market: Industry Trends, Share, Size, Growth, Opportunity and Forecast 2021-2026," the GCC artificial intelligence market grew at a CAGR of around 24% during 2015-2020.

value.title: GM's Cruise, Alphabet's Waymo win permits to offer self-driving rides to passengers in California
value.excerpt: General Motors Co's Cruise and Alphabet Inc's Waymo self-driving car subsidiaries on Thursday became the first companies to receive autonomous vehicle permits to offer rides to passengers in California.
